amendatorysection.para: Sections 69-2301 to 69-2314 shall be known and may be cited as the Disposition of Personal Property Landlord and Tenant Act.

annotation.para: The scope of the Disposition of Personal Property Landlord and Tenant Act is not so narrowly confined as to exclude commercial leases; as such, the act applies in commercial lease cases. Pan v. IOC Realty Specialist, 301 Neb. 256, 918 N.W.2d 273 (2018).
